VoiceList.Entry: “You're the AVALANCHE!”
Cloud “Those light beams are the Shinra's security sensors. We can't go any further.”
Cloud “Shinra security guards are there. …We've got to turn back.”
“A terrorist attack!”
“AVALANCHE is attacking!”
“Intruders!”
“More security's coming. It's dangerous to stay here.” Run Stay here
Barret “That's one damn tiny hole. You tellin' me to squeeze into that to get under the Plate? No way!”
“Yo,Cloud,what're we gonna do?” Look inside Go down Don't go
Barret “Don't be wastin' time. Never know when the Shinra'll find us.”
“Cloud,you jus' gotta go.” Go down Don't go
Barret “But,damn man, that thing gives me the chills.”
Barret “Whaddya mean we're not goin' in? There ain't no other way of gettin' to the Sector 5 reactor 'cept through here.”
Tifa “…Doesn't seem to be anything that'll get us stuck in this duct.”
Cloud “After coming this far, only an amateur'd get caught by a security sensor.”
Cloud “Yeah. If we go down this duct,we won't be able to come back.”
Barret “Good,so far everything's going as planned.”
Barret “That was close. I thought we were gonna get caught…”
Barret “Oh man…… We were forced to get this far out.”
Barret “Don't let your guard down till we get to the Sector 5 reactor.”
Barret “They probably don't know we sneaked in yet. We'll be at the reactor in no time.”
Barret “We can't just go back now. We've gotta go on.”
Barret “Biggs,Wedge and Jessie got everything ready for us. So MOVE it.”
Barret “Biggs,Wedge,and Jessie did good. Now,it's our turn!”
Jessie “I'm sorry.”
Wedge “Cloud,this way. The reactor's up this ladder.”
Biggs “We're gonna pull out now. We'll meet up at the hideout.”
“Cloud,we're countin' on you to blow the reactor!”
Jessie “Next time, I'll give you something better.”
“I'll be back at the hideout in my research room workin' on it.”
Jessie “The ID scan problem on the train was all my fault.”
“I modified your ID card… And that's what did it…”
“I did my best… But I failed.”
Barret “The reactor's just down this tunnel!”
